column5: private event and simply cocktails I have done them all here.  The service
column6: sangria and tapas are great.  The menu selection is extensive but I try to go for different tapas each time it still have my favorites
column7: beef medallions with blue cheese crust
column9: staple goat cheese and red sauce
column10: scallops are great as well.   This place has such a great vibe and a beautiful decor
column11: it's huge and has several rooms
column12: if I could find one negative it would have to be the bathroom situation or lack of
column13: they have one in a private room and another that you have to take a steep staircase down too.  Besides that
